project: AI-Powered Personalized Climate Change Advocacy Campaign Manager
description: A platform that leverages AI to create and manage personalized climate change advocacy campaigns tailored to individual beliefs, behaviors, and local environmental factors.

features.name: User Profiling
features.description: Collects data on user beliefs, behaviors, and location to personalize advocacy messages.

features.name: AI-Generated Content
features.description: Creates customized advocacy materials such as emails, social media posts, and petitions.

features.name: Campaign Management
features.description: Schedules and tracks campaign outreach efforts and engagement metrics.

features.name: Behavior Change Recommendations
features.description: Suggests actionable steps based on individual user profiles to reduce carbon footprints.

features.name: Local Impact Insights
features.description: Provides information on local environmental issues and relevant policies.

features.name: Community Engagement
features.description: Connects users with local advocacy groups and events.

goals: Increase personalized climate change advocacy effectiveness
Enhance user engagement through tailored content
Promote local and individual action on climate change
